newsitem.title: INDIA: India's RBI lowers repo cut-off to 2.5 pct.
newsitem.headline: India's RBI lowers repo cut-off to 2.5 pct.

text.p: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) said on Friday it lowered the cut-off to 2.5 percent from 2.9 percent at its four-day repo auction of government securities.
The RBI said it received 65 bids for 78.90 billion rupees, of which it accepted 17 for 36.40 billion rupees.
The weighted average rate was 2.4705 percent, it said.
